an6.88:4.1: “Mendicants, someone with six qualities is unable to arrive at certainty regarding the right path in wholesome qualities even when listening to the true teaching.
an6.88:4.3: When the teaching and practice announced by the Realized One is being taught they don’t want to listen. They don’t pay attention or apply their minds to understand them. They learn the incorrect meaning and reject the correct meaning. They accept views that contradict the teaching.
an6.88:4.4: Someone with these six qualities is unable to arrive at certainty regarding the right path in wholesome qualities, even when listening to the true teaching.
an6.88:5.1: Someone with six qualities is able to arrive at certainty regarding the right path in wholesome qualities when listening to the true teaching.
an6.88:5.3: When the teaching and practice announced by the Realized One is being taught they want to listen. They pay attention and apply their minds to understand them. They learn the correct meaning and reject the incorrect meaning. They accept views that agree with the teaching.
an6.88:5.4: Someone with these six qualities is able to arrive at certainty regarding the right path in wholesome qualities when listening to the true teaching.”
